content.detailedDescription:
I was playing golf with my friends and we play fast so i didn't spend much time looking at it (speed golf factor). i pointed it out to my golf buddy but since it wasn't god he didn't pay much attention to it.
i observed it on the 15th hole at northmore country club on grand lake st mary���s. this was tube or cigar shaped either white or silver. it had what appeared to be some red markings towards the front lower portion. the craft was low about as low as a single engine plane fly���s. it had no wings and no props and made no noise moving slowly or not at all. i had my club in my hand when i seen it took my shot and it was gone. i regret not watching it longer.

i spend a lot of time looking up for something not really sure why. at this course i have observed a a-10 fly over and tip it's wing, i could see the pilot, 3 huge helicopters at one time that had to be military, several black helicopters at different times. i am very familiar with the skies around this course. this observation seems very similar to case number 26582.
content.summary: Cigar or cylinder shaped, white or silver, red color marking on front, no props, no exhaust and was pretty low. this object made no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard with my mom an my girlfriend doing yard work, when i stop to get a drink of water i noticed a plane heading north-eastish.Im staring at this plane i see a flash of an orange ball that was lower an further out then the plane but heading the opposite direction of the plane (southwest).I tell my mo to get the banoculares so i can get a better look. as soon as shegets back outside i zero in on it, all tho it was blurry from being so far away  i could make out a cigar shape with a wider rear which was where the flashinglight was coming from. it wasnt like a comercal planes lights, it blinked in slow intervals an i could see it in day light as clear as if it were at night. after i was done looking at i handed my mom the banoculares so she could see it, she looked at it for a minute or two an it just faded away.
content.summary: Cigar shaped an blinking orange

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i observed and videotaped a strange light in the sky last night just before and around 7pm pst.  we live in camarillo california and observed the light/craft from our balcony which is oriented facing west-northwest.

the light or craft appeared to be glowing brightly orange-red.  the light seemed to undulate or grow brighter and then dimmer. the light appeared to the west-northwest and slowly moved due east, appearing to get closer and larger.  we observed several other aircraft in the sky at the same time. the normal civilian and military aircraft's lights were noticably different than the light/craft that we were observing.

i am a former usaf air trafic controller trained in aircraft recognition, air traffic control and weather observation. i could not readily identify what i was looking at.  it did not have standard aircraft lighting. eventually as the very slow moving light/craft crossed to a point where it was relatively straight across and up from us, it simply vanished to my eye. my wife believed she could still see something/ some form after the light disappeared.
a few minutes after the light "disappeared" another light-craft appeared on the horizon at approximately the same point the first one appeared.  it followed the same "flight route" and again disappeared near the point where the first one disappeared.  i observed the second craft through binoculars. the light or glowing red/orange color appeared to be sandwiched between a "hull" or craft shape.  as the craft moved closer, the single glowing light seemed to turn into four small red lights in a diamond pattern...Just prior to disappearing.

the view from our porch/balcony looks out almost straight across the camarillo airport.  there is also pt.Mugu nearby.  we have a lot of air traffic around us.  the light/s we observed appeared quite different and larger than any other air traffic that was visible. no strobe light, no red or green safety lights like normal aircraft. it appeared much larger than any other aircraft in the sky simultaneously and had a mildly pulsating glow.

we captured both craft/lights on a amatuer sony home video camera.

i have no idea what we observed but my wife and i are interested in reporting it, sharing our video and finding an explanation however ordinary it may turn out to be.
content.summary: Observed slow moving, glowing, large, light to the nw from camarillo.

content.detailedDescription:
My son witnessed the object sighting, i'm making the report on his behalf.

he told me that he was visiting with a friend and noticed a strange light in the night sky. he said he thought it was a very bright star at first but the object got larger and was moving.. he took a picture of the object with his cell phone and looked down at the picture to see how it came out when he looked back up the object had vanished.
content.summary: Noticed object in the sky while visiting with friend

content.detailedDescription: I saw an entity, male, beside my bed. i was paralyzed. he is th esame one whom has been visiting me for awhile. i do not remember much else at this point. i have other memories from other visits in he past that are very strange to say the least.
content.summary: I saw an entity beside my bed,

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i just came home from a wedding reception.  i went into the house to use the bathroom and my husband called me out.  he said "look at that".  i witnessed 3 yellow orange orbs in the sky above the tree line.  they appeared to be very playful as two of them kept circling each other.  they moved across the sky at a good pace but slow enough for us to enjoy them.  we watched them until they moved out of sight behind woods and hills.  they were silent the whole time they were hear.  my husband mentioned to me that he saw another group of three like them before i got out there with him.  they appeared to be the same as the ones i witnessed with him.  these looked like nothing i have ever seen before. i just felt curiosity when i saw them and hoped other people was able to witness them also.  this is the first time my husband has ever seen something that he could not explain either.  these were most definately not a plane or ordinary thing.  no question.
content.summary: Yellow/orange orbs floating playfully in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down stairs in my house which is on the water and faces the li sound. i saw 2 planes that were too small to be planes with people pilots and too big to be toys. i heard the engine first then looked and saw these 2 planes nearly missing each other in some acrobatic manuever that i could best describe by the planes being completely vertical, flat and fanning each other, nearly missing each other. then they disappeared. there is a point to my west where the bight (i live on petty's bight named so because it looks like someone took a bite out of the beach) where it jutts out, the plane seemed to disappear behind a bush but i thought that would be impossible since i did not see or hear them again. my 2 daughters were sitting in the living room and when i asked them if they just saw that event that took a matter of seconds. one said i saw it and the other said i didnt see it but heard plane engines. i am a pilot and always observe the sky. there is a small private airport next to my house called rose airport which is rarely used and harbors no planes. these planes were never seen again. i could describe them in detail but the defining mark was at the wing tips appeared to have round plates, not oval which i have seen before, these looked like pie plates. please contact me if any question. 

i appreciate your organization in every way and jesse ventura too. i would always be available to house jesse and his crew if he were coming here to investigate plum island and he could use my boat too. i am a resident of orient point, i can see plum island from my window, and happy that he is investigating plum island. 

also, i own this house since 1995. 2 times i saw what i call "shadow images". once a gray ball flew across my path into the empty lot across the street and the other day i swear i saw a shadow/grey image of a cat leaping through the air into the bushes. not a ufo but something i saw. 

also, in 1993, i will never forget, i was driving in a jeep with my boyfriend on 8th street in nyc and about 6 pin lights, colors red and blue, came into the jeep and appeared to be scanning us. these pin lights appeared to not have a source. i am a photographer and looked all over for the source of the tiny bright dots that went all over our bodies then left, we even stopped the car and looked outside, there was only the pin light, no stream of light indicating a source. they were inside the car, all over, even out feet, how could a light even get there?
content.summary: I was walking down stairs in my house which is on the water and faces the li sound. i saw 2 planes that were too small to be planes and too big to be toys.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4, 1947, i happened to be walking west through woodland park in seattle, washington. i think july 4, 1947, was the correct date because other witnesses (such as a seattle city bus driver and u.S. navy man *(name deleted--cms/sg) who took a photo of a white disc over seattle on july 4, 1947)also saw ufos over seattle around the same time on july 4, 1947.   at the time, i was a 22-year-old student at the nearby university of washington in seattle.  the time was around 5:30 pm in early twilight. woodland park overlooked puget sound and the olympic mountain range to the west. i happened to look up and saw a bright, oval or sphere-shaped object descending straight down from the upper atmosphere.  as i looked on in sudden surprise, the object made a very sharp and  almost 90-degree turn to the horizontal and then sped south along puget sound at high speed.  the object was silent and white in color. the total time of the sighting was probably ten or 15 seconds. at first, i thought the white object was an airplane but an airplane would not have come right down from the upper atmosphere and then make a very sharp right-angled turn to the horizontal with no noise of motors    the object seemed to be heading toward mount rainier (about 50 miles south of seattle) and mount adams and mount st. helens. after ten seconds or so, the object disappeared from view to the south as it sped south along puget sound. on june 24, 1947, pilot **(name deleted--cms/sg) and prospector ***(name deleted--cms/sg) reported seeing nine silvery "flying saucers" moving from north to south over mount rainier and mount adams to the southeast.  on july 4, 1947, pilot ****(name deleted--cms/sg) and co-pilot *****(name deleted--cms/sg) and a stewardess on a united airlines flight  said that they saw nine flying saucers (or ufos) flying from southeast to northwest near boise, idaho.   on july 4, 1947, a seattle city bus driver and other witnesses in the university of washington area said that they saw ufos over seattle about the same time that i saw the object oer woodland park.   u.S. navy man *(name deleted--cms/sg) took a photo of a white object north of the university of washington near seattle on july 4, 1947.
on july 10, 1947, ******(name deleted--cms/sg) took two photos of a moving disc over phoenix, arizona.  my drawing of the july 4, 1947, sighting can be seen in the 1967 book by ted bloecher:  report on the ufo wave of 1947.  i may have seen  one of the nine "flying saucers" seen by **(name deleted--cms/sg) and ***(name deleted--cms/sg) over mount rainier and mount adams on june 24, 1947, and perhaps one of  the similar nine saucers sighted  by the united airlines crew members near boise, idaho, on july 4, 1947, and moving from southeast to northwest toward seattle.
content.summary: On july 4, 1947, i looked up into twilight sky and saw a bright, oval object coming  straight down from atmosphere that made a sharp right-angled turn to horizontal and flew south at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Friday evening i spotted a fireball in the western/northwestern sky of land o lakes, fl.  it was a very large sized fireball kinda falling/sailing and then vanished in the air.  it was a bright orange ball that seemed to be flaming, but not necessarily on fire.  looked more like the "vapor"/fumes of a fire.  i guess like looking at the top portion of flames burning in a grill or gas stove.  if that makes any sense.

i decided to post this sighting to hopefully get others in the area to submit their own sightings in the area.
content.summary: Very bright fireball

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work on the highway. i wondered why the cars in front of me were slowing down. the highway was in dangerous conditions of ice and snow and there were alot of wrecks that day. i was concentrating so hard on the road that it took me a bit to realize why people were slowing and some were pulling over. i have an expedition... very large truck, high in the air. there was a huge triangle craft with one bright white light on each corner approaching from the right side above, heading across the highway. it was silent, moving slow and so close it made me just gasp. i felt it would not be far from the roof of my truck. i pulled over, got out of the truck, waited for the few cars that were coming to pass, in all that time the craft only got to the other side of the highway. i had a wierd dizzy feeling and i remember going across the highway even though i was scared. the car in front of me, the wife was pulling her husband telling him to get back in the car. she was terrified. i went to the middle of the highway feeling this odd hazy feeling. i watched this thing just slowly float away and higher in the air. i now noticed that as it got further away, i lost that weird feeling i had. could have been adrenaline, but i don't think so. that usually makes you very fast, this was like i was almost in a trance. i will never forget that craft. i came home, started searching the internet that night and you can even find my writing to people online if you google it asking people who actually posted videos on youtube in indiana as well to please contact me because i had just seen what they were posting online.
content.summary: Huge triangle craft on highway

content.detailedDescription: I was out fishing the smith river east of a rural town ulm montana. it was approx. 4:30 pm when i noticed what looked like a flock of many birds traveling south west over the lewis and clark national forest. i assumed they were canadian geese but these type birds don't climb that high in the sky especially just below clouds! i then though....These are some type of lights and were moving fast going in the southernly direction toward helena. they were initially clumped together and started spreading out, then disappeared behind the clouds. this sighting lasted about 20 seconds, very unusual.
content.summary: Many round lights

content.detailedDescription: Me my dad my stepmother and my baby sister were all in the car. we were going home from a friends house,my dad was driving. when the object came down just above the tree tops on left side of the car. i was in looking up at the object the whole time. you could have cut the fear in the car with knife, my dad tried to get away from it, driving at high speed on a curvy road at speed more than 80 mile an hour. object kept pace with us chasing the car. i could see a window and what looked like a bright white skeleton laughing, i could see black eyes or dark eyes where the eye would be. it glowed the same bright white as the object, i could only describe the object as a ship. i never seen my dad so scared in all my life, and he doesn't scare easy. i just remember the chase and how scared my father and stepmother were. i don't know if i passed out or what happen after that, but my dad says he pulled over and got out of the car. he then said the craft put a beam of light down on him, then took off. he also told me he had to take my stepmother to the hospital, because she was hysterical. some people say they have seen ufos, well how many of been chased by one,and better yet how many people have seen a possible alien. this was a real event, only told to relatives, which didn't believe it. my dad has told me not to tell anyone, because people would think were nuts! i also have a strange dot on the back of my ear, looks like a tattoo ink dot, but i have never had a tattoo,and it's under the skin slightly. i would be happy to answer any questions you have regarding this event.
content.summary: Bright white rectagular with a window

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo sighting: 11/14/10
at approximately 1750 hours (10 minutes to 6 pm est) tonight, november 11th, i witnessed a ufo approaching my home just south of chester, virginia. it was coming from the direction of richmond (north of chester).  when it was above me it, it turned to the southeast and headed towards the direction of hopewell.  had it continued without changing direction it would have continued to parallel i - 95.  at an arms distance, it was approximately one third to one fourth the size of a dime but was an extremely bright white.  i used my cell phone to call my wife to come witness the ufo with me since i was standing beside our mailbox by the road and she was inside our home.  she did.  it was silent and brighter than any stars.  i called my brother, kevin, who lives in hopewell to tell him about our witnessing the bright craft.  to my surprise, he and some of his neighbors also witnessed the ufo.  he said he travelled over the petersburg federal reformatory and over hopewell.
i wonder how many others witnessed this ufo?

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
(i am a former mufon investigator, a former usaf sergeant & nuclear alert pad mechanic, retiree of 33 years of dod, author of divine curses ��� e-book on amazon, author of ���first try web page,��� paranormal warnings.Com)
chester, virginia

*(wit's phone number and email address deleted--cms/sg).

p.S.  
 i have been a little leery of pushing my experiences and beliefs out to the public, but i do not want to deal with a guilty conscious when all hell breaks out.  also, i do not like reporting ufos, but they seem to popping up on a regular basis now.
content.summary: Extremely bright white, no sound, 5-10 miles above ground, made a turn

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from east haven and saw a light flashing in the sky about a mile from our house from inside of the car. it didn't look like the typical aircraft were used to seeing flying in and out of tweed or down the coastline. when we pulled onto our street we saw the same light again over long island sound in a fixed position not moving. we went into the house got our camera and walked down to the beach. we stood there for about 30 minutes and just observed it. it didn't move up or down or any direction, but it would change from white, to red, to blue. at first we were excited to see this weird object in the sky, but eventually we figured there must be some reasonable explanation for this event. a man walked down the street and paused for like 3 minutes as he passed us, kinda creepy. so we decided to go home. the camera had a hard time focusing on the object.
content.summary: Ball of light over long island sound, changed color, fixed position

content.detailedDescription:
Around 4pm eastern time on november 14, 2010, i was driving northbound and glanced up  in the sky and spotted a shining metallic object. it was a beautiful autumn day, sunny and crisp, clear skies as far as the eye can see. what caught my attention more than anything was the lack of movement from this object in the northwestern sky. the object was stationary with the sun shining off it's metallic and cylindrical shape. it's hard to judge how far away it was, all i can say is that it wasn't very close, but wasn't very far away either. 

i only saw it for about 10-20 seconds before i rounded a bend where my view was blocked by trees. approximately 20-30 seconds after losing visibility, i hit a clear stretch of road that enabled a good view. the object had inexplicably vanished. nowhere in the sky was it to be seen. 

i am familiar and an avid follower of the "mysteries" beyond public recognition, such as extra terrestrial existence, secret governments, the potential and nature of human consciousness, etc. having seen many videos and photos of ufos, i almost immediately recognized the object in the sky as one of them. rationally speaking, had the object been a plane of some sort, there's no way it could have gone from unmoving to completely vanished in a mere 20-30 seconds. as stated, it was a very crisp and clear day, and had the "plane" flown off, i would have spotted it somewhere in the sky, yet there wasn't a single trace of it. 

i have read a theory before that most ufo's cannot be seen because of the dimension they are in. but if they linger too long in the earth's atmosphere, they become visible due to the gravitation pull. and if they stay long enough, they become permanently part of this dimension. 

unfortunately, because of the short time i had to react, i could not snap a photo or take a video with my phone. this is the first time i have potentially seen a ufo, and i'm sure someone else out there had to have seen it. keep in mind that wright patterson air force base is nearby in the dayton area. so seeing planes fly by is an everyday occurrence. the unmoving, metallic structure, and inexplicable disappearance of this object is why i believe it was not part of the air force.
content.summary: A stationary metallic object was floating in the dayton area (centerville/kettering) and then vanished inexplicably

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin went outside around 11:45pm or so to take my puppy to go potty. we walked out of my house on the walkway and waited for my puppy to finish up. it was cold and i was just looking around in the sky since it was clear and you could see all the stars. i was looking up and then i looked forward and i saw some light come up from behind the trees, it was quite a bit away from us but it was really bright. it looked like a star in the sky but it was brighter than any other star in the sky. i nudged my cousin and told him to look at it because i didn't know what it was and neither did he. as it was still going up in the sky at a slight angle it then started going faster still really bright. so i ran down my driveway into the road to get a better look while my cousin stayed with my puppy by the house. i was kinda freaked out simply because i didn't know what it was and why it went from slow to fast that quick and why it was so bright. at first i thought it was some night launch the space center was doing but from all the night launches i've seen, they never looked like that or did what it did.  my cousin yelled to me that it was turning and coming close to us in which it was and at that point i got kinda scared and  i turned and ran back to my walkway where my cousin was. as it was turning it got closer and wasn't as high in the sky as the stars were. the brightness of it went down and all you we could see was this thing flying in the sky and were trying to see if looked like a plane or something like it. it was kinda a disc like shape and it had lights but it wasn't flashing the way planes do. planes usually have two flashing lights on the each side and varies in color, what we saw was it had multiple lights (kinda yellow kinda orange) that were flashing left to right in a horizontal line. we couldn't see the other side of the object so we weren't sure if there were lights on the other side of it or not. when it was closer to my house it got slower in speed and it kinda turned east and went in that direction at the same slow speed. we lost sight of it due to the trees being in the way and we couldn't go any farther to chase it in the sky. i was a little freaked out from not knowing what it was and kinda in disbelief of what we just saw. we tried coming up with what it could've been: a rocket night launch from the space center, some kind of plane, a shooting star (but i thought that couldn't be it cause shooting stars don't go up and then hover with lights). and we figured planes couldn't and usually don't make that kind of random speeds and turn that fast then slow down and hover with strange lights like that either. it was very bright too so we couldn't explain it.  and after that happened we started see shooting stars randomly in the sky. i didn't have time to get my camera or video cam but i drew quick sketches of what happened.
content.summary: Really bright fast star like shape slowed down into disc shape w/ weird lights over my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a vacation in lisbon and in 19 september 2010 i made a trip to sintra. i took this picture from a balcony from sintra pacace.
the strange thing was that i didn't see anything with my eyes, only later, in the evening, when i reviewed all photos in that day.
content.summary: I took a picture with an invisible ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking up at the sky from my back-yard and trying to see the stars in the dusky sky in the early evening and noticed a few dim stars.  i live in a small town and the street lights hamper seeing the full night sky, but the major stars are visible.  a brighter white star-like object suddenly appeared approximately 55 degrees above the horizon in the east. it was moving toward the north-east at such a steady pace i thought it must be a plane. then it seemed to be moving more quickly than a plane.  there were no blinking lights, just a steady white light.  it's hard estimate it's altitude but it was easily 5 times larger than the dim stars behind it. i watched for about 5 seconds and then it simply disappeared as quickly as it appeared.  at no time was there any sound from it.   i stayed for another minute to hear any sound and there was none.  there is still  no cloud cover as i write this ten minutes later.
i have seen this kind of object so often over the last three years that it's hardly an event anymore.
content.summary: Star-like object appears 55 degrees up from horizon due east, moving ne for 5 seconds and disappears. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I try to look up at the sky as often as possible, in hopes of increasing my odds of making a sighting. today while smoking a cigarette out my 3rd floor apt window - i saw in the clear blue sky a bright star-like object moving at a very subtle speed - then increasing in speed and slightly changing direction. i rushed outside to get a better view - and there it was stopped, or at least barely moving. then it came to a stationary position - and slowly began to move to the right. after about it a minute it just disappeared. although it was too far away to see it's exact shape - i don't know of any airplanes or helicopters that behave like this - i don't believe it fits into any category besides unidentified.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star-like object - varying speeds - stopped, turned direction

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for the iss to fly by at out cst time zone at 5:55 pm i observed a tiny light green object the size of a peanut hovering silently and directly in front of me. this object was within 5' of my reach. it was slightly illuminated. i stared directly at this object and made sure i took notice of it's size and shape. suddenly it just vanished. i have a friend named jim haydon from capstone house in panama city florida that  i have been in contact with over the past 6 years. i have provided him with information regarding other events in my past. this may come as a surprise but he has come in contact with a number of stones in his possession from an unknown source. he has had these analyzed at fsu. he believes he has obtained these stones from his involvement with me. this latest sighting is a surprise to me.
content.summary: A 1' light green olyptical shape appeared 5' in front of me in mid air then suddenly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night saturday  november13,2010 at around 6:30 or just as dusk was ending i was driving home north on hwy 95 from cistern genreal store. as i approached our driveway i noticed an object across the street (east from our driveway) that looked like a plane with its white, red & blue lights on approaching.Then i noticed it just seem to hover so i thought it was an helicopter. i crossed our cattle guard ,parked my tahoe, and got out to have a better look.It wast going anywhere except up and down and side to side. the object didnt make a noise.Since it was rapidly getting dark i couln't define the shape of the object. i watched it for about 10 minutes.The darker it got outside the lights became very brilliant and sharp.
i drove home on my 1/4 mile drivway to get binoculars and my son to go back with me to see the object.He took forever  (15 minutes)to get ready packing blankets,hats & gloves since it was a cold night.We returned to the end of our driveway and parked the car again right in front of the field where the object was hoovering. it seemed as if it had moved a bit upwards and to the north from where i oriiginally spotted it.My sons first thoughts were that it was either a plane or helicopter. i told him impossible beacuse there was no noise and it hadnt really moved for the past 30 minutes or so.
as soon as i looked thru the binoculars a white orb appeared right under the object and it began to travel to the s,e.. i asked my son if he could see it and he said no. i removed the binocs and all i could see was an occasional really bright flash where it was traveling. i continued to look again thru them for about 20 secs until it was gone.
coinsidently last saturday 11/6/2010 i made another mufon report regarding a daytime sighting of a  traveling orb that looked exactly like what i saw last night. the case # is 26461 for that sighting!
back to the hovering object....My son & i watched it spin,move up and down and side to side. when viewed thru the binocs you could make out a shape but then it would shift, it appeared star like with many points and faceted like a diamond.Sometimes it would look saucer like but on it's side with white spikes coming out of it. it seemed to have a protruding light on it's side which i called a nose.
after watching this with my son for about 15 minutes i called my husband to come up front and take pictures with his new  toy a cannon powershot 4000.He took about 10 pics with different settings which i will try to upload. they came out really good for his first attempt filming at night a non-stationary object.Well after about 30 minutes of this my husband and son were cold tired and bored with it so the went home.
i decided to drive down the highway about a mile  to where the object had slowly moved (probably not a good idea for a woman on a lonely country highway chasing a ufo to do).It was now across the street from my friend *(name deleted--cms/sg)house. i pulled over the side of the road and called her and told her to go outside and look across the street up in the air, above the trees at the light. she asked me what is that?I told her i dont know but i am coming over.
armed with my binocullars and *(name deleted--cms/sg)with hers we both watched in amazement this brilliant colorful morphing object..She said well thats not a plane, a helicopter,satelite,planet or star, then what is it!? the object was moving upwards and to the north but very very slowly.At times it had a purple halo around it like a black light.After watching it for about 20 or 30 minuutes with her she then noticed a second object that was pulsating! this one was  gold, smaller but also star like shaped (like an christmas tree topper with many points).It also made the same movements as the other one.
at about 9pm i decided to call it a night and went home.This am about 5:30 i went back out to our drivways end to see if they were still there but it was overcast. i could see an occasional star peeking thru the clouds ,then i noticed a tiny light moving over head towrds the north. i pointed my flash light at it and bam it lit up like jupiter for about 10 secs then disappeared or cloaked,it was under the cloud cover when traveling north.
tonight we will go back armed with camera and tripod to see if the objects will still be here.Last feb we had something similar to this  that stayed here for 2 weeks, every night same time same place.My husband thought maybe it was some kind of fixed satelite or station but i think they are not stationary.Anyway this will be our familys 5th report with mufon in 2 yrs. we have had other interesting sightings that have not been reported but told to our mufon invevstigator **(name deleted--cms/sg) has visited our ranch out side austin and witnesed with us unussual activities in our clar clean night sky.My friend  ***(name deleted--cms/sg) who i met on the mufon chat board call where i live ufo alley.....
photo one..Notice the orbs...The bright one is the object...The 3 rd object u may need to zoom 200%
we have more photos if interested..I hope i picked the best ones
sorry for this long report and not so great writting skills:)
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Thought it was helicopter hovering above  field but no noise/lasted for hours

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo was a typical delta wing but huge, it flew in from the channel way from what seamed england. this ship dropped smaller ships after appearing from the coast. one of these small ships landed in my garden and then exploded and left behind a small perfectly spherical metal ball. (which i am having tested at the moment}, although it is extremely heavy, it is very small, i would say a 5x5x5 cm sphere which weighs 30kg.

if this piece of metal is placed in the microwave it floats in the middle of the microwave.

before this craft exploded (or imploded) i was quite somber until it shrunk into this tiny pellet. i would like to know from you if this craft could be "increased" to its original state in order to utilise its amazing technology
content.summary: This was a real ufo that landed in my garden

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from lakeport to upperlake on hwy 29 at 5:45 pm.  it was dark and there was partial cloud cover.  i noticed some lights to my left comming through the cloud cover.  i though it odd that a plane would come down so low so i watched.  the lights were unusual.  they were too large to be plane lights and they didn't blink fast.  there were two big white lights and one green light between and behind the white.  the green one stayed on and the white ones binked slowly right then left.  i pulled over to watch because it was so odd.  it went right over me without making a sound.  i drove the next 7 miles home really fast.  when i got home my husband came out to meet me and i told him what i saw.  as i was talking a loud military plane flew by pretty low.  my husband commented on how low it was and that that was unusual in itself.  it was headed in the direction i just came from.
content.summary: Three lights under clouds passed over me

content.detailedDescription: Aprox.At 2:11 am i was letting my dogs go outside to the back yard.I noticed a flash of light about 30 degrees south in the sky. looking for the light then i noticed again .At first i thought it was an airplane, helicopter or some type of satelite but then i realized it couldnt be that . the flash didnt move from his position . i went inside & got my coat & binoculars. the flash appeared every 13 seconds with no navegation lights,it had 3 very small vertical paralell lights. it looked very high in the sky. aprox. 10 minutes later it moved north in reference with the sorrounding stars.It remained there for several minutes & then moved south again to another position. after a few more minutes it started to move east & loses its  brightness until it faded very slowly out of the sky.  the pulses always remain at the same time.There was no sound throughout the whole observation. this lasted about 20 minutes.
content.summary: Pulse flash of light moved diferent directions

content.detailedDescription: I was in greece,second leg/chalkidiki. we had been a group of 5 people (witnesses) sitting at night time at the beach watching the stars. there were some cloudy spots at the sky but mostly we could see the clear nightsky. then suddenly out of nowhere there were 3 triangles in perfect formation howering over us. theyre formation looked like one big triangle exaclty. we could clearly see the shape of them and the lights all 3 of them had at every corner of the triangle. the lights had been kind of a warm red to orange colour but very intensive. never seen something like this before. i hardly can remember if there also was an light in the middle of each triangle. these triangles were flying very slow and with no sound at all, thats why we first thought it was a kite. but we could see the shape and it looked massive and metal in black colour. they seemed to be flying very low, but then the front light of the first triangle became hidden by a cloud, its light was shinig trough out the cloud, there we understood,that it was flying quite high and must have been huge, because it was flyin over the clouds and not underneath them. the thing wich scared us most was that in the moment the first light was going to be hidden by the cloud they all just dissapeard. it seemed like somebody put out the lights, but it wasnt like this,it all got invincible. we can tell this for sure because in the moment it became invincible we could see the sky with its stars again wich had been hidden before by the crafts for the time of the appearing. during the sighting i felt very good and pleased not really scared but i knew somehow that we'd seen a ufo.
content.summary: 3 black triangles

content.detailedDescription: On the cloudy days.... i was outside and happen to look up into the sky... the ship that i saw was covered or hidden with the clouds and see-thru.  when it started to move slowly i could see the flat smooth shape in the puffy clouds. then it disappeared. hidden by the clouds again.
content.summary: Ufo flew over my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside retrieving packages from my truck.  stopped on ramp to look at the night sky with all its stars and slow moving planes high up.  above the tall trees across from my deck going from annapolis area toward waysons corner came a ufo flashing across the sky.  it's head (?) was large and its trail was very long.  it was very very fast.  it was not a falling star or space debris as it was horizontal not vertical.  this was the first ufo i have ever seen.  in my youth i have seen many falling stars and even the aurora borealis in the north (nj) so i know it wasnt these things.

2.  it was very very bright and it was dark out so it startled me.

3.  i thought it was a ufo.

4.  see main paragraph.

5.  i felt excited, uneasy and anxious to find someone else who had seen it.

6.  it went behind tall trees toward the west and was gone.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Not round head with tail from horizon to horizon very bright but not high.

content.detailedDescription:
- driving west to east on sr 528/bennett causeway 
 - noticed white ball of light on south side of causeway, thought it was a reflection
 - traveled over the bridge and then noticed green triangle n the sky
 - pulled over at mile marker 52
 - 2 sober witnesses
 - white ball of light would travel from an obscured point (behind the bridge) near the water line in an indirect path, at variable speeds to rise and strike the green triangle
 - triangle had 3 illuminated side illuminated in green - 2 sides were flashing and the third did not (nor was the third illuminated across the length of the side).
 - when struck, the triangle visibly moved from the apparent impact
 - on one impact, a flash of light occurred (one witness to this - the other was dialing cell phone and was not looking in that direction for this impact)
 - witnessed 5 impacts
 - 911 was called (8:12pm time on my iphone)
 - what appeared to be a law enforcement vehicle parked away from us in the median and seemed to be looking in the same direction
 - after approx. 20 minutes of viewing drove away - green triangle still in the sky
content.summary: Green triangle taking impact

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the north east extension of the pa turnpike, going south, coming out of the tunnel, i was looking at the sky, i like star gazing, but it was kind of cloudy, on my left i look and see this swirling rainbow color object dancing around in the sky, going in crazy directions, just swirling around, , then it disappeared and then these small red round objects started darting around, coming together, then separating again, then seemed to form an outline of a triangle. i found the rainbow object to be quit beautiful, i wasn't afraid at all. i took a few pictures with my cell phone as i was driving, but couldn't keep taking my eyes off the road. they were still there as i drove past the area that they were in.
content.summary: Seen swirling object dancing around in the sky, had a rainbow color effect on it, then it was followed by round red glowing orb like objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a cigarette at 145 this morning looking at the sky and noticed a huge triangular shaped craft silently cruise overhead. could have easily been the size of a football field. there were 12? lights making out the bottom outline that seemed to form into different shapes as it passed overhead, much in the same way birds flock (but these were not birds). a single light moved in a circular motion inside of the ones on the outside. the lights were red/amber and weren't bright. i don't want to say dim either but they were really noticeable if you were looking up.  silently glided by without making a single sound.  it seemed to be flying fairly low over the city. since im in an urban area i had to run out to the front of my house into the street as i watched it disappear over the row of houses.  blew my mind.

anybody else see this?
content.summary: Massive silent triangular craft silently flew overhead
